summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3494, for the improvement of Duwamish Avenue (west side) from Juneau Street to a point 308 feet northerly from the south line of Section 28, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M., all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43307 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
